reviews.text:
Trippi Bar is a hidden gem at the roof top of Hotel Jen Orchard Gateway! The tiki-inspired decor with absolute tropical vibes creates an inviting and relaxing atmosphere. The drink selection is fantastic and the cocktails are not only visually stunning but also incredibly refreshing !! Especially the green frozen drink I had, which was a perfect mix of flavors.

The staff is friendly and attentive adding to the overall great experience. Whether you’re looking to chill by the pool or enjoy a lively evening, this place is a must-visit. Highly recommend!

Amazing bar with best food, drinks, and service. Seriously, the bartenders and service staff are top knotch and extremely knowledgeable. Special shout-out to Elisha and Jian Bin from the management team, they are incredible at running events there as well.

Drinks aside, the view of the city skyline and of MBS is to die for. Definitely worth coming here for the photo opportunity

Trippi Bar at JEN Hotel offers a breathtaking view overlooking Singapore’s city center—an absolute must-visit! The ambiance is perfect for unwinding, whether you’re with loved ones or simply enjoying a quiet moment. Their juices and cocktails are by far the best I’ve ever had—crafted to perfection with fresh ingredients and incredible flavors. The combination of stunning scenery, refreshing drinks, and a relaxing atmosphere makes this an ideal spot to chill and soak in the beauty of the city. Highly recommended!

OMG!! This is a list visit!! What an amazing place!  The views are stunning especially at night!! The staff are amazing so friendly and so helpful and the open until 10pm with a life guard on duty!! Wow! Wow! Wow!!

Trippi Pool Bar delivered on every level: beautiful setting, relaxing atmosphere, tasty drinks, and some of the friendliest service I’ve experienced in a while. Huge thanks to Shadiq for making it such a memorable visit. I’ll definitely be back, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking to unwind by the pool with great company and even better cocktails.
